entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
